data.author: Choong-Soo Lee

changelog.release_notes:
- Compiled with SDK 4
- Added support for Emery (Pebble Time 2)
- Added "Thickest" option for hour and minute hands
- Fixed a bug where Pebble Health warning showed up when Pebble Health feature is not used.
- Crushed a bug regarding a custom location change and cache.
- Fixed a bug where the watch face could spam weather requests when seconds and/or second hand is enabled.

Weather updates failed on Sep. 19, 2016 because of exceeding weather update rate limit at Open Weather Map API. This update is to push an emergency fix to lower the rate by utilizing a cache of weather data retrieved. Hopefully, it works!
- Minor bug fixes
- Compiled with SDK 4.0 with support for Diorite platform

- More background colors enabled
- Colors for tick marks
- Limit hourly vibration to certain part of the day
- Pebble Time Round support added

- Battery bar (ascii version) is added
- More Pebble health information (distance in kms and miles) added
- Squashed more bugs!

- We hit the free limit use of Open Weather API! Thanks for the overwhelming support!
- The watchface is updated in the hopes to spread out the weather update requests to stay under the free limit.
- Added the daily steps as one of the data to be displayed.
- Hourly vibration option added
- Fixes an issue where settings and weather do not work on Pebble Classic and Pebble Steel
- Fixed the inability to save a custom location for weather updates

- Color customization added
- Bug fixes
- Fixed a minor display issue with seconds

- Fixed an issue where the weather updates were failing
- Minor bug fixes

- Typos corrected
- Minor bug fixes
Minor bug fixes
- Fixed a bug where the watch face was constantly requesting weather update, resulting in a major battery drain in both the watch face and the phone.

- Hopefully most, if not all, of major bugs are squashed!
- No need to reconfigure everything every time you change settings
- Sorry for your inconvenience caused by versions 2.x. Please feel free to report any more bugs if you find them!

data.description:
Based on an Apple watch face.
- Digital and analog time
- Hour and minute hand width settings
- Optional second hand and digital display
- Digital day of week, month and day
- Configurable information in each corner
  -- Battery life % (* shown when charging)
  -- Battery bar
  -- Current temperature (C or F)
  -- Current weather condition description
  -- Current city
  -- Current wind direction and speed (m/s or mph)
  -- Relative humidity (%RH)
  -- Atmospheric pressure (kPa)
  -- Daily steps (Pebble Health)
  -- Daily distance (miles or km) (Pebble Health)
  -- or nothing!
- Current weather condition icon (optional)
- Optional bluetooth connection status
- Bluetooth connection vibration settings
- Background options (black / white)
- Color customization
Thanks for all your encouragements, comments and suggestions!

latest_release.release_notes:
